officialTitle: A Single Arm Intervention Study to Assess the Role of Structured Cardio-Oncology Rehabilitation Exercise to Improve Cardiovascular Health in Early Stage Breast Cancer Survivors (CORE Study)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* History of early-stage breast cancer (I-III)
* Currently receiving or have completed adjuvant therapy (i.e. chemotherapy, surgery, radiation, targeted therapies)
* Able to communicate in English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy
* Metastatic disease (Stage IV)
* Unable or unwilling to complete cardiopulmonary exercise test
